name: Grumpy Cloud
description:
This game was created in the Scratch Engine

V1.0 Instructions:

Mouse / Arrow keys / Wads to move your cloud

X / E to throw a lighting bolt

Q / Z / Space to rain

You need to destroy all the mankind objects (like houses, planes...), and dodge trees and birds, also if you see a dry tree, rain in it until it becomes a normal tree

When some houses / planes get destroyed, they have a chance to drop some cash, touch it to earn some money

Features:

-20 Skins (some with custom animations and sounds)

-7+ Obstacles and events (high winds and cities)

-3 Custom songs by me (Smaker64)

This is my first game on itch.io, so don't expect a lot, thank you :)
Also, this game contains some bugs (mostly bugs about the game volume)

Scratch Version: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/721943361/
